price: (We) wabagaburiye mu gihe cy’amapfa, ndetse akanabaha umutekano mu gihe cy’ubwoba.
arabic: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٖ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: alladhī aṭʿamahum min jūʿin waāmanahum min khawfin
